titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Rowland Hutt, 6. 2. 1946
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Ã–NB (Autogr. 1280/33-5); Kopie im BA.

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Sorry I missed you the other day. It's always a good plan to send a wire before you come to avoid disappointment on both sides. I could easily have been in if I'd known. I'm glad you're getting 3 rooms in Farnborough soon. If you're all ready I'll come for a house-warming.
May you live as happily as it is possible in these very awful times.
